org.wildfly.swarm.config.infinispan

Class CacheContainer<T extends CacheContainer<T>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.AbstractMap<K,V>
      • java.util.HashMap
        • org.wildfly.swarm.config.infinispan.CacheContainer<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Cloneable, Map

    public class CacheContainer<T extends CacheContainer<T>>
extends HashMap
    The configuration of an infinispan cache container
    See Also:
